externalTransfer.ApprovalChoose:
Choose the person who will approve your external share request.
Not every person is a valid approver, check who are the approvers in your unit
Notice! The approver will get read permission on the file.

externalTransfer.ApprovalInstructions: The users are taken from the other domain
externalTransfer.CanApprove: this file will be approved automatically
externalTransfer.ApproverUnit: the approver needs to be in the unit:
externalTransfer.ApproverRanks: and with on of the ranks:

note.SecretData: It is under your responsibility to make sure the following:

The document does not contain exact operative information
The document does not contain intelligence-based quotes
The document does not contain sensitive information collection methods
note.IAgree: By pressing 'Agree' I declare that I have read the above and that my request meets the requirements
